businessProfile.name: Benny Ferrovia‚Äôs Pizza
businessProfile.address: 340 W Tremont Ave Suite 120, Charlotte, NC 28203, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 340 W Tremont Ave Suite 120, Charlotte, NC 28203, USA

reviews.text: This Benny‚Äôs is the the best Benny‚Äôs. We literally come here every single Tuesday and pack out a couple of the tables after coming from prayer night. Lorenzo is the best. If you see him, tell him ‚ÄúDeclan says hi.‚Äù

This has to be one of the worst pizzas I've yet to have.  I ordered a large pie, 1/2 cheese, 1/2 mushrrom at a price of $40 and change.
36" is the only size they sell. Alternatively, 7+ dollars per slice.
I ordered a large pie to get a fresh pizza tasted as the slices were sitting out.
Sadly,  the pizza lacked a quality ingredients taste and feel. The cheese has no stretch and felt dry,, the pie itself had very little sauce, which also attributed to its dry feel. The dough was cooked and browned on the bottom. However, it lacked crunch, it had more of a moist doughy texture/feel.
Overall,  mediocre pizza compared to an authentic Italian pizzeria, I would compare it to frozen supermarket pizza, perhaps one step up because if it is colossal size
First and last time visit.

I have had Benny's Pizza in Manassas Virginia and it was one of the best pizzas I have had outside of NYC. Benny's in Charlotte is just as good. We had a great slice of cheese pizza. Staff was very friendly. Highly recommend.

Please train your staff to properly handle online orders. I placed an order for two 14‚Äù cheese pizzas and arrived around 9:50 PM on 4/13/25. The man behind the counter didn‚Äôt greet me, just asked ‚Äúwhat can I get you?‚Äù I told him I was picking up an online order, gave my name, and he claimed nothing was there.

I showed him my phone with confirmation and updates, and he said he didn‚Äôt know how that system worked‚Äîsaid he‚Äôd never seen it before. Instead of asking for help, he kept acting like the order didn‚Äôt exist. After spelling out my name clearly (Issa), he finally found the pizzas sitting right behind him on top of the oven the entire time.

This was my first time visiting, and I won‚Äôt be back. If your staff doesn‚Äôt know how to work with online orders, at least train them to ask someone who does. Customer service matters.

(I‚Äôll be posting a photo of the pizza too‚Äîbut honestly, I didn‚Äôt even feel like tasting it after that experience.)

Benny Ferrovia‚Äôs pizza will always be a great place for me to grab a great slice of Pizza but Kobe is what makes it shine. He is always welcoming, attentive, helpful, and genuinely cares on a personal level about each person that comes in. He‚Äôs like the Chuck Norris of pizza. When Kobe slices the onions for the pizza, the onions cry. Thanks again Kobe!

recentReviews.author: Eric Rosales
recentReviews.text: I have had Benny's Pizza in Manassas Virginia and it was one of the best pizzas I have had outside of NYC. Benny's in Charlotte is just as good. We had a great slice of cheese pizza. Staff was very friendly. Highly recommend.

recentReviews.author: Candido Barbosa
recentReviews.text:
This has to be one of the worst pizzas I've yet to have.  I ordered a large pie, 1/2 cheese, 1/2 mushrrom at a price of $40 and change.
36" is the only size they sell. Alternatively, 7+ dollars per slice.
I ordered a large pie to get a fresh pizza tasted as the slices were sitting out.
Sadly,  the pizza lacked a quality ingredients taste and feel. The cheese has no stretch and felt dry,, the pie itself had very little sauce, which also attributed to its dry feel. The dough was cooked and browned on the bottom. However, it lacked crunch, it had more of a moist doughy texture/feel.
Overall,  mediocre pizza compared to an authentic Italian pizzeria, I would compare it to frozen supermarket pizza, perhaps one step up because if it is colossal size
First and last time visit.

recentReviews.author: Declan Linfoot
recentReviews.text: This Benny‚Äôs is the the best Benny‚Äôs. We literally come here every single Tuesday and pack out a couple of the tables after coming from prayer night. Lorenzo is the best. If you see him, tell him ‚ÄúDeclan says hi.‚Äù

recentReviews.author: Aidan Baxter
recentReviews.text: Benny Ferrovia‚Äôs pizza will always be a great place for me to grab a great slice of Pizza but Kobe is what makes it shine. He is always welcoming, attentive, helpful, and genuinely cares on a personal level about each person that comes in. He‚Äôs like the Chuck Norris of pizza. When Kobe slices the onions for the pizza, the onions cry. Thanks again Kobe!

recentReviews.author: Issa Smith
recentReviews.text:
Please train your staff to properly handle online orders. I placed an order for two 14‚Äù cheese pizzas and arrived around 9:50 PM on 4/13/25. The man behind the counter didn‚Äôt greet me, just asked ‚Äúwhat can I get you?‚Äù I told him I was picking up an online order, gave my name, and he claimed nothing was there.

I showed him my phone with confirmation and updates, and he said he didn‚Äôt know how that system worked‚Äîsaid he‚Äôd never seen it before. Instead of asking for help, he kept acting like the order didn‚Äôt exist. After spelling out my name clearly (Issa), he finally found the pizzas sitting right behind him on top of the oven the entire time.

This was my first time visiting, and I won‚Äôt be back. If your staff doesn‚Äôt know how to work with online orders, at least train them to ask someone who does. Customer service matters.

(I‚Äôll be posting a photo of the pizza too‚Äîbut honestly, I didn‚Äôt even feel like tasting it after that experience.)

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customer opinions are divided. The 3.4/5 rating from 5 recent reviews suggests some great experiences mixed with areas needing attention.

strengthsPerceived: Customers love the personal connection and outstanding service provided by staff members like Lorenzo and Kobe, who make the dining experience memorable. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
Benny's Pizza is praised for its high-quality pizza that rivals even the best in NYC, making it a standout choice for pizza lovers. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
The friendly and welcoming atmosphere created by the staff encourages repeat visits and strong customer loyalty. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
improvementOpportunities: Poor handling of online orders and lack of staff training - review management can address this concern
Negative customer service experience - social media marketing can improve this area
Negative reviews about pizza quality - review management can address this concern

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
